Detailed Description

This class manages the treelibrary on the left side of the Application.

00087         // if found
00088         bool found = false;
00089         
00090         // strings to store md5-hash
00091         wxString objHash;
00092         wxString xmlHash;
00093         
00094         // pointer to wxZipEntry
00095         wxZipEntry* entry;
00096         
00097         // make zip of inputStream
00098         wxZipInputStream inZip(instream);
00099         
00100         // entry to first inZip entry
00101         entry = inZip.GetNextEntry();
00102         
00103         // walk through all entries and look for xml and obj
00104         while (entry)
00105         {
00106                 // check if .xml
00107                 if (entry->GetName().Matches(wxT("*.xml")))
00108                 {
00109                         // make string of inputstream
00110                         wxStringOutputStream strout(&xmlHash);
00111                         
00112                         // open zip stream
00113                         inZip.OpenEntry(*entry);
00114                         
00115                         // read and write to strout
00116                         inZip.Read(strout);
00117                         
00118                         // close zip entry
00119                         inZip.CloseEntry();
00120                         
00121                         // get hash
00122                         xmlHash = MD5wxString(xmlHash);
00123                 }
00124                 
00125                 if (entry->GetName().Matches(wxT("*.obj")))
00126                 {
00127                         // make string of inputstream
00128                         wxStringOutputStream strout(&objHash);
00129                         
00130                         // open zip entry
00131                         inZip.OpenEntry(*entry);
00132                         
00133                         // read and write to strout
00134                         inZip.Read(strout);
00135                         
00136                         // close zip entry
00137                         inZip.CloseEntry();
00138                         
00139                         // get hash
00140                         objHash = MD5wxString(objHash);
00141                 }
00142                 
00143                 // get next Entry
00144                 entry = inZip.GetNextEntry();
00145         }
00146         
00147         // reset stream
00148         instream.SeekI(0);
00149         
00150         // reference
00151         wxString ref = objHash + xmlHash + wxT(".oax");
00152         
00153         // iterator
00154         std::vector<LibraryEntry>::iterator it;
00155         
00156         for (it = m_ptrEntries->begin(); it != m_ptrEntries->end(); it++)
00157         {
00158                 if (it->getReference() == ref)
00159                 {
00160                         // set found
00161                         found = true;
00162                 }
00163         }
00164         
00165         if (!found)
00166         {
00167                 // cat-id
00168                 unsigned int cat = addCategory(categoryname);
00169                 
00170                 // new entry
00171                 m_ptrEntries->push_back(LibraryEntry(name, ref, cat));
00172                 
00173                 // add physical to library
00174                 m_library->addEntry(ref, instream, m_newCat);
00175                 
00176                 // rebuild
00177                 buildTreeCtrl();
00178         }
00179         
00180         return objHash + xmlHash;
00181 }

void TreeLibraryController::pasteEntry ( wxString  reference  ) 

Definition at line 311 of file TreeLibraryController.cpp.

00312 {
00313         // oax import
00314         OaxImport import;
00315         
00316         // get scene and prepare assembly
00317         Scene* scene = Scene::getInstance();
00318         Assembly* assembly;
00319         
00320         //query scene for hash or load from file
00321         assembly = scene->getOrigialFromHash(reference.BeforeFirst('.'));
00322         
00323         //found one, just clone from
00324         if (assembly != NULL)
00325         {
00326                 //overwrite pointer here
00327                 assembly = assembly->clone();
00328                 
00329                 //reset clone
00330                 assembly->setXYZ(0.0,0.0,0.0);
00331                 assembly->setPhi(0.0);
00332                 assembly->setRho(0.0);
00333                 assembly->setTheta(0.0);
00334         }
00335         //or load from library container
00336         else
00337         {
00338                 // wxMemoryOutputStream to store oax data
00339                 wxMemoryOutputStream* memOut;
00340                 
00341                 // get data
00342                 memOut = m_library->getEntryData(reference);
00343                 
00344                 // wxMemoryInputStream to store oax data
00345                 wxMemoryInputStream memIn(*memOut);
00346                 
00347                 // wxZipInputStream
00348                 wxZipInputStream inZip(memIn);
00349                 
00350                 // import
00351                 import.Load(inZip);
00352                 
00353                 // assembly pointer
00354                 assembly = import.getAssembly();
00355                 
00356                 // set hash
00357                 assembly->setHash(reference.BeforeFirst('.'));
00358                 
00359                 // delete memOut
00360                 delete memOut;
00361         }
00362         
00363         // insert assembly
00364         scene->insertAssembly(assembly);
00365         
00366         // update gl
00367         scene->glRefresh();
00368 }

00445

00447         for (catit = m_ptrCategories->begin(); catit != m_ptrCategories->end(); catit++)

00450                 TreeLibraryItemData* itemData = new TreeLibraryItemData();

00453                 itemData->setCat(true);
00454                 itemData->setName(catit->getName());
00455                 
00456                 // append to treectrl
00457                 tiid = m_treeCtrl->AppendItem(catId[catit->getParentId()], catit->getName(), -1, -1, itemData);
00458                 
00459                 // set image
00460                 m_treeCtrl->SetItemImage(tiid, (int)TreeCtrlIcon_Folder);
00461                 
00462                 // store tiid into map
00463                 catId.insert(std::pair<unsigned int, wxTreeItemId>(catit->getCategoryId(), tiid));
00464         }
00465         
00466         // walk through all entrys and append to tree control
00467         for (entit = m_ptrEntries->begin(); entit != m_ptrEntries->end(); entit++)
00468         {
00469                 // new itemdata
00470                 TreeLibraryItemData* itemData = new TreeLibraryItemData();
00471                 
00472                 // set assembly
00473                 itemData->setCat(false);
00474                 itemData->setName(entit->getReference());
00475                 
00476                 // append to treectrl
00477                 tiid = m_treeCtrl->AppendItem(catId[entit->getCategoryId()], entit->getName(), -1, -1, itemData);
00478                 
00479                 // set image
00480                 m_treeCtrl->SetItemImage(tiid, (int)TreeCtrlIcon_Assembly);
00481         }
00482         
00483         // sort
00484         for (catIdit = catId.begin(); catIdit != catId.end(); catIdit++)
00485         {
00486                 m_treeCtrl->SortChildren(catIdit->second);
00487         }
00488         
00489         // expand root
00490         m_treeCtrl->Expand(root);
00491 }

unsigned int TreeLibraryController::addCategory ( wxString &  name  )  [private]

Definition at line 183 of file TreeLibraryController.cpp.

00184 {
00185         // check if already exist
00186         m_newCat = true;
00187         
00188         // return
00189         unsigned int ret;
00190         
00191         // iterator
00192         std::vector<LibraryCategory>::iterator it;
00193         
00194         // walk through all categories
00195         for (it = m_ptrCategories->begin(); it != m_ptrCategories->end(); it++)
00196         {
00197                 // category found
00198                 if (it->getName() == name)
00199                 {
00200                         // set return
00201                         ret = it->getCategoryId();
00202                         
00203                         // set found
00204                         m_newCat = false;
00205                 }
00206         }
00207         
00208         // not found, create new one
00209         if (m_newCat)
00210         {
00211                 // increment id
00212                 Library::m_categoryId += 1;
00213                 
00214                 // new category
00215                 m_ptrCategories->push_back(LibraryCategory(name, Library::m_categoryId, 0));
00216                 
00217                 // set return
00218                 ret = Library::m_categoryId;
00219         }
00220         
00221         // return
00222         return ret;
00223 }

00380         // should correspond to TreeCtrlIcon_xxx enum
00381         wxBusyCursor wait;

00384         wxIcon icons[3];

00387         icons[2] = wxIcon(icon_library_assembly_xpm);

00392         {
00393                 if (size == sizeOrig)
00394                 {
00395                         images->Add(icons[i]);
00396                 }
00397                 else

00400                 }
